title: Love at High Tide
description: Darcy Trent is lucky Cooper Hudson is on hand to sweep her off her feet-literally-when she nearly drowns while swimming in the ocean. But life-saving aside, Mr. Perfect's timing Darcy's career is about to take her to the complete opposite side of the Atlantic. Still, a little summer loving with the tall, blond and sexy former cop is far too tempting to pass up.When his plans to enter the Secret Service went south thanks to a bum knee, Coop retreated to the family beach house to mull his future. Romance is the last thing on his mind, until he fishes a curvy brunette out of the sea. Now, spending time in Darcy's arms seems like the ideal distraction, even if it is just for a week.But with Darcy's departure date fast approaching and their careers on the line, can they realize in time that their beach fling might become the real thing?46,000 words
author: Christi Barth
